entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then west 20 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
